quote: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: I'm not a chef. But I'm passionate about food - the tradition of it, cooking it, and sharing it.
name: Zac Posen

quote: Technology is, of course, a double edged sword. Fire can cook our food but also burn us.
name: Jason Silva

quote: Food is not just eating energy. It's an experience.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: The best way to celebrate the holidays is with some delicious food.
name: Rachel Hollis

quote: I get way too much happiness from good food.
name: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
name: David Chang

quote: Food is for eating, and good food is to be enjoyed... I think food is, actually, very beautiful in itself.
name: Delia Smith

quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
name: Kevin James

quote: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
name: Jo Brand

quote: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
name: Paul Prudhomme

quote: The need for connection and community is primal, as fundamental as the need for air, water, and food.
name: Dean Ornish

quote: When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor.
name: Euripides

quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
name: Hippocrates

quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: If you're a happy person around food, you can be a professional chef. It's fueled by passion.
name: Ranveer Brar

quote: I like food. I like eating. And I don't want to deprive myself of good food.
name: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: Eating good food is my favourite thing in the whole world. Nothing is more blissful.
name: Justine Larbalestier

quote: Eating good food is, to me, one of life's greatest joys, and I will never punish myself for it.
name: Miriam Shor

quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy.
name: Rene Redzepi

quote: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: You can't have a healthy civilization without healthy soil. You can't have junk food and have healthy people.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: By eating many fruits and vegetables in place of fast food and junk food, people could avoid obesity.
name: David H. Murdock

quote: The best comfort food will always be greens, cornbread, and fried chicken.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Cats know how to obtain food without labor, shelter without confinement, and love without penalties.
name: W. L. George

quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Patience is the secret to good food.
name: Gail Simmons

quote: Wine is bottled poetry.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you who you are.
name: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: Everyone would be healthier if they didn't eat junk food.
name: Robert Atkins

quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
name: Doug Larson

quote: There's nothing more romantic than Italian food.
name: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: Sometimes a little comfort food can go a long way.
name: Benjamin Bratt

quote: I'm into mellow dates with really good food.
name: Lauren Conrad

quote: Fettucini alfredo is macaroni and cheese for adults.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct.
name: Denis Leary

quote: He was a bold man that first ate an oyster.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I don't know if you call a burger 'recession food.' It's comfort food.
name: Michael Mina

quote: Know you food, know your farmers, and know your kitchen.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: If you have good food, people will come to your restaurant.
name: Mickey Gilley

quote: Food rules. Little rivals the pleasure of tearing into a glistening burger.
name: Mary H.K. Choi

quote: Thank you to our farmers for all you do to keep food on our tables.
name: Elise Stefanik

quote: If you're out, and starving, and need a bite to eat, then you need fast food.
name: Nicholas Hoult

quote: The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later you're hungry again.
name: George Miller

quote: The more colorful the food, the better. I try to add color to my diet, which means vegetables and fruits.
name: Misty May-Treanor

quote: Everyone appreciates good food.
name: Michael Seibel

quote: Once, during Prohibition, I was forced to live for days on nothing but food and water.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: If I can, I love staying in pajamas all day and watching movies and eating good food.
name: Becky G

quote: Cats have a scam going - you buy the food, they eat the food, they go away; that's the deal.
name: Eddie Izzard

quote: I want my food dead. Not sick, not dying, dead.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Ice cream is my comfort food.
name: Jessie Ware

quote: Good food is good food. It doesn't have to come with pretense.
name: Christina Tosi

quote: I have an enormous fondness for delicious food. It's very comforting.
name: Teri Garr

quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.
name: Kurt Cobain

quote: Food is everything. Food, friends, family: Those are the most important things in life.
name: Zac Posen

quote: Even if you don't think you can cook well, you can cook better than the food industry.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Chinese food tries to engage the mind, not just the palate. To provoke the intellect.
name: Nicole Mones

quote: We have to bring children into a new relationship to food that connects them to culture and agriculture.
name: Alice Waters

quote: A waffle is like a pancake with a syrup trap.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Food Stamp recipients didn't cause the financial crisis; recklessness on Wall Street did.
name: Barack Obama

quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety.
name: Aesop

quote: Food is not rational. Food is culture, habit, craving and identity.
name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: We know that without food we would die. Without fellowship, life is not worth living.
name: Laurie Colwin

quote: If I'm going to eat fast food, I'm going to McDonald's. I don't need to pretend.

quote: Food brings people together on many different levels. It's nourishment of the soul and body; it's truly love.
name: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: Pasta is the one food I can't live without. It's the food I eat to fuel my running.
name: Joe Bastianich

quote: Promises and pie-crust are made to be broken.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: You can tell alot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food.
name: Tom Brady

quote: Comfort food is really anything you want at that time. That said, I really love Naple-style pizza.
name: Geoffrey Zakarian

quote: Man should not try to avoid stress any more than he would shun food, love or exercise.
name: Hans Selye

quote: Food simply isn't important to me.
name: Alice Paul

quote: Not to like ice cream is to show oneself uninterested in food.
name: Joseph Epstein

quote: A heart can no more be forced to love than a stomach can be forced to digest food by persuasion.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: Gluttony is an emotional escape, a sign something is eating us.

quote: Making food is a wonderful way to spend a Friday night.
name: Chrissy Teigen

quote: My favorite time of day is to get up and eat leftovers from dinner, especially spicy food.
name: David Byrne

quote: It's like spicy food - sometimes you have to tone it down so more people can enjoy it.
name: Babyface

quote: Ounce for ounce, herbs and spices have more antioxidants than any other food group.
name: Michael Greger

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
name: Julia Child

quote: Food is a common denominator for all people.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: My best hostess tip is to have good food and really good music!

quote: Food is the moral right of all who are born into this world.
name: Norman Borlaug

quote: Food can be expressive and therefore food can be art.
name: Grant Achatz

quote: Food is celebratory. People who don't cook don't know how much fun they're missing.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Spaghetti can be eaten most successfully if you inhale it like a vacuum cleaner.

quote: And what, Socrates, is the food of the soul? Surely, I said, knowledge is the food of the soul.
name: Plato

quote: Thank you, horseradish, for being neither a radish nor a horse. What you are is a liar food.
name: Jimmy Fallon

quote: I was eating bad stuff. Lots of sugar and carbs, junk food all the time. It makes you very irritated.
name: Avril Lavigne

quote: I still eat a burger at a counter with ketchup dripping down my face.
name: Scarlett Johansson

quote: For me, the good food starts with good product.
name: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quote: If we as a society are willing to have a preference for organic food, the farmer can pass on the savings.
name: Robert Patterson

quote: I can pick good food, but I can't pick a good man.
name: Debbie Reynolds

quote: Statistics show that of those who contract the habit of eating, very few survive.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I like food too much to go on some crazy diet. French fries are my favorite downfall.
name: Holly Madison

quote: Junk food drags you down.
name: Miranda Lambert

quote: I eat junk food, cheesecake, cheese, pizza - but just lower amounts of it.
name: JWoww

quote: I am still not a fussy eater, although I do enjoy good food.
name: Yves Chauvin

quote: We should all grow our own food and do our own waste processing, we really should.
name: Bill Gates

quote: We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun.
name: George Orwell

quote: It's difficult to think anything but pleasant thoughts while eating a homegrown tomato.
name: Lewis Grizzard

quote: A house is no home unless it contain food and fire for the mind as well as for the body.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: Italian food is all about ingredients and it's not fussy and it's not fancy.
name: Wolfgang Puck

quote: Like Hollywood movies, MTV and blue jeans, fast food has become one of America's major cultural exports.
name: Eric Schlosser

quote: My feeling is that labels are for canned food... I am what I am - and I know what I am.
name: Michael Stipe

quote: I can't stay away from Chinese food. I really love that stuff.
name: Shaun White

quote: We have wild animals in zoos, yet people rarely meet their 'food' face to face.
name: Elayne Boosler

quote: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk.
name: James Joyce

quote: Without food, we cannot survive, and that is why issues that affect the food industry are so important.
name: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: A 10-pound sack of potatoes lasts a long time.
name: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Long as I was riding in a big Cadillac and dressed nice and had plenty of food, that's all I cared about.
name: Etta James

quote: I only eat spicy food.
name: Joshua Ledet

quote: I don't eat fast food often, but I love tacos. I could write prophetically about how perfect the taco is.
name: Ken Baumann

quote: I love the masochistic aspect of eating seething, real Sichuan food in Sichuan Province.
name: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Primarily I'm a meat man, although once in a while I toy with a few vegetables.
name: Nat King Cole

quote: Health food may be good for the conscience but Oreos taste a hell of a lot better.
name: Robert Redford

quote: The kitchen oven is reliable, but it's made us lazy.
name: Jamie Oliver

quote: Our lives are not in the lap of the gods, but in the lap of our cooks.
name: Lin Yutang

quote: I love to take something ordinary and make it really special.
name: Ina Garten

quote: The kitchen is a sacred space.
name: Marc Forgione

quote: The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
name: James Thurber

quote: If food were free, why work?
name: Douglas Horton

quote: I never eat in a restaurant that's over a hundred feet off the ground and won't stand still.

quote: The only think I like better than talking about Food is eating.
name: John Walters

quote: My favorite animal is steak.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
name: Mark Twain

quote: An Englishman teaching an American about food is like the blind leading the one-eyed.
name: A. J. Liebling

quote: I saw few die of hunger; of eating, a hundred thousand.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Beware the hobby that eats.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Sandwiches are wonderful. You don't need a spoon or a plate!
name: Paul Lynde

quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: As long as there's pasta and Chinese food in the world, I'm okay.
name: Michael Chang

quote: Almost every time we get together with family or friends, the conversation ends up being about food.

quote: My weaknesses have always been food and men - in that order.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: It's difficult to believe that people are still starving in this country because food isn't available.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: If God did not intend for us to eat animals, then why did he make them out of meat?
name: John Cleese

quote: I was always a junk food person, still am.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul.

quote: Who doesn't like to get dressed up and eat good food?
name: Victoria Arlen

quote: Italian food really reflects the people. It reflects like a prism that fragments into regions.
name: Lidia Bastianich

quote: Animals are my friends... and I don't eat my friends.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I think people should eat vegetarian food for 20 days and then see the glow on their faces.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that.

quote: Words do two major things: They provide food for the mind and create light for understanding and awareness.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Food can bring people together in a way nothing else could.
name: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: Knowledge of the past and of the places of the earth is the ornament and food of the mind of man.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I really love good food occasionally, but I need time to enjoy it, and I need to be hungry.
name: Clare Balding

quote: I don't eat fast food, but I can't live without pizza.
name: Trevor Donovan

quote: Say yes to everything. 'You want me to buy you some food?' Yes. 'You want me to buy you a car?' Yes.
name: Cardi B

quote: The need for love and intimacy is a fundamental human need, as primal as the need for food, water, and air.
name: Dean Ornish

quote: I'm obsessed with Chinese food and culture. It's food that I adore above all others.
name: Andrew Zimmern

quote: If you combine good flavors, food turns into an orchestra.
name: Joey Fatone

quote: Nothing that has value, real value, has no cost. Not freedom, not food, not shelter, not healthcare.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: Cultivation to the mind is as necessary as food to the body.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Appetite, craving for food, is a constant and powerful stimulator of the gastric glands.
name: Ivan Pavlov

quote: Hey, I used to eat at McDonald's: I liked the taste of the food, especially the French fries.
name: Eric Schlosser

quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience.

name: Johnny Depp

quote: If you see a black family, it's looting, but if it's a white family they are looking for food.

quote: I love food. I'm a big food person. I'm really passionate about eating good food all the time.
name: Dreama Walker

quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I'm a bit of a gourmet chef. I love cooking - mostly Thai food.
name: Will Ferrell

quote: Provision as much pure and organic food as you can, and let the rest go by.
name: Laurie Colwin

quote: In Italy, they add work and life on to food and wine.
name: Robin Leach

quote: Whenever I am feeling happy or sad, I always find comfort in food.
name: Rachel Hollis

quote: We use competitive markets to arrange for delivery of our food supply.

quote: Food was a labor of love you felt by cooking it and eating it.
name: George Tillman, Jr.

quote: I'm kind of a homebody. I like to sit at home and watch movies and eat good food.

quote: I won't eat any cereal that doesn't turn the milk purple.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: The French cook; we open tins.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: I'm certainly well taken care of in terms of food and clothes.
name: Bill Gates

quote: We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it.

name: Peter Benchley

quote: Not like Chinese food, where you eat it and then you feel hungry an hour later.
name: Ray Liotta

quote: If I like a food, I'll eat it, even if I know it's not good for me.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I'm too lazy and I like food and I like my free time too much to spend it working out!

quote: The way I see it, love is an amusement park, and food its souvenir.
name: Stephanie Klein

quote: Sorry, I don't eat any fast food. I believe in eating healthy organic foods for a better lifestyle.

quote: To be interested in food but not in food production is clearly absurd.
name: Wendell Berry

quote: Facts are to the mind what food is to the body.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: I always say that candy is the perfect studio food - it keeps your energy going.
name: Nick Cannon

quote: My idea of fast food is a mallard.

quote: I was 32 when I started cooking; up until then, I just ate.

quote: Too many people just eat to consume calories. Try dining for a change.

quote: Eating rice cakes is like chewing on a foam coffee cup, only less filling.
name: Dave Barry

quote: The first thing to know about space food - it is the ambiance; it is the environment. It is not the food.

quote: I love hotel rooms, so I take pictures of the room and the way out and the lobby, the food and drink.
name: Geoffrey Zakarian

quote: Food insecurity is not remotely the same as hunger.
name: Bret Stephens

quote: Unlike curing cancer or heart disease, we already know how to beat hunger: food.
name: Mario Batali

quote: To me, food is as much about the moment, the occasion, the location and the company as it is about the taste.
name: Heston Blumenthal

quote: I promised her an interesting life and good food, and the rest is history.
name: Bob Ehrlich

quote: I want to make wines that harmonize with food - wines that almost hug your tongue with gentleness.
name: Robert Mondavi

quote: So, what's it like in the real world? Well, the food is better, but beyond that, I don't recommend it.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: Never order food in excess of your body weight.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Triple D is all about three things: Food, story and character.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: I won't eat anything green.
name: Kurt Cobain

quote: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak.
name: Ted Nugent

quote: If your mother cooks Italian food, why should you go to a restaurant?
name: Martin Scorsese

quote: I was very impressed with the street food of Singapore. I was very impressed with the dishes that they did.
name: Jose Andres

quote: When we get in late and the only thing open is fast food, it can be tough to maintain a healthy diet.
name: Mike Trout

quote: Get people back into the kitchen and combat the trend toward processed food and fast food.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
name: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Food is a coping mechanism; people are afraid of giving it up because then they'll feel confused and lost.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: Food makes me happy. Make me work round the clock, but just feed me first!
name: Deepika Padukone

quote: Comfort food is absolutely moving upscale.
name: Danny Meyer

quote: Almost certainly, however, the first essential component of social justice is adequate food for all mankind.
name: Norman Borlaug

quote: I don't know any chef who doesn't like fast food.
name: Paul Hollywood

quote: Any healthy man can go without food for two days - but not without poetry.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I don't believe in twisting yourself into knots of excuses and explanations over the food you make.
name: Julia Child

quote: It's around the table and in the preparation of food that we learn about ourselves and about the world.
name: Alice Waters

quote: Stop being a vegan and start enjoying what you eat.
name: Jamie Oliver

quote: Give your kids a bloody knife and fork and let me put some fresh food in front of them they can eat.
name: Jamie Oliver

quote: There's no such thing as 'bad' food or 'good' food.
name: Ella Woodward

quote: Food is a passion. Food is love.
name: Hector Elizondo

quote: If food is processed - like canned or frozen - you can reduce the risks of pathogens.
name: Steve Ells

quote: If you're going to America, bring your own food.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I hid myself in food.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: I love fast food, but you have to try to eat healthy.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: You can't make a souffle rise twice.
name: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: Is Elizabeth Taylor fat? Her favorite food is seconds.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: My work has also motivated me to put a lot of time into seeking out good food and to spend more money on it.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: Food should be fun.
name: Thomas Keller

quote: But once in a while you might see me at In and Out Burger; they make the best fast food hamburgers around.
name: Thomas Keller

quote: I haven't eaten at a McDonald's since I became President.
name: William J. Clinton

quote: I will not eat oysters. I want my food dead. Not sick. Not wounded. Dead.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Why does man kill? He kills for food. And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Food isn't like anything else. It's something precious. It's not a commodity.
name: Alice Waters

quote: The mechanical food system externalizes a lot of costs like obesity or Type 2 diabetes.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: The sharing of food is the basis of social life.
name: Laurie Colwin

quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
name: A. Whitney Brown

quote: There's not a single chef I know of that does not think about the politics of the food they're serving.
name: Gail Simmons

quote: My food demons are Chinese food, sugar, butter.
name: Kirstie Alley

quote: The most successful person is the one who is most inspired. That is true in food and in life.
name: Ron Ben-Israel

quote: Compassion is a call, a demand of nature, to relieve the unhappy as hunger is a natural call for food.
name: Joseph Butler

quote: Food is a part of life. People are foodies and love to shop for food.
name: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quote: Fast sex, like fast food, is cheap, but it doesn't nourish the body - or the soul.
name: Suzanne Fields

quote: I've got tremendous respect for different cultures, for the food and everything.
name: Ian Rush

quote: I love food - I am never on a diet - I swear to God!
name: Irina Shayk

quote: I love all kinds of bread. Whenever I crave junk food, I want salty things like peanuts or potato chips.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: Maybe a person's time would be as well spent raising food as raising money to buy food.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body.
name: Pat Buchanan

quote: Everything in food is science. The only subjective part is when you eat it.
name: Alton Brown

quote: I'm a new mum who spends her days making baby food and cooking for her man. And I couldn't be happier.
name: Rebecca Loos

quote: Indian junk food is my sin, even though I pretend to like Japanese.
name: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Preparing food is not just about yourself and others. It is about everything!
name: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Cajun is country food by farmers and fisherman that arrived in Louisiana from Acadiana, Canada.
name: Paul Prudhomme

quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
name: James Beard

quote: Your body requires hydration to digest your food, to regulate your hormones, and to be able to think clearly.
name: Mandy Ingber

quote: If I had the choice between smoked salmon and tinned salmon, I'd have it tinned. With vinegar.
name: Harold Wilson

quote: I said to my friends that if I was going to starve, I might as well starve where the food is good.
name: Virgil Thomson

quote: It's easy for Americans to forget that the food they eat doesn't magically appear on a supermarket shelf.
name: Christopher Dodd

quote: Food is medicine. We can actually change our gene expressions with the foods we eat.
name: David Perlmutter

quote: I grew up playing music and enjoying good food, friends and family in my own backyard.
name: Rodney Atkins

quote: Cocktails and food are social.
name: Jon Taffer

quote: Sharing food with another human being is an intimate act that should not be indulged in lightly.
name: M. F. K. Fisher

quote: I love food, and the food industry is huge, and I just love dealing in it.
name: Chubby Checker

quote: I wanted to write a food book, but I'm not a chef or an expert on culinary matters, to put it mildly.
name: Kate Christensen

quote: I love spicy food, love it. But wasabi is just painful.
name: Devon Werkheiser

quote: Japanese food makes me feel particularly good.
name: David Mitchell

quote: I love good food. I'm an epicurean, that's for sure... But I am not really a good cook.
name: Gaspard Ulliel

quote: But all that being said about modulation, if you're serving people delicious food, they won't complain.
name: Sally Schneider

quote: Even the other kids who people made fun of made fun of me. That's where I stood on the school food chain.
name: Nonito Donaire

quote: Don't make jokes about food.
name: David Lean

quote: One should eat to live, not live to eat.
name: Moliere

quote: People in Slow Food understand that food is an environmental issue.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: Italy will always have the best food.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Know how to garnish food so that it is more appealing to the eye and even more flavorful than before.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: If you want to eat well in England, eat three breakfasts.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Ever notice that Soup for One is eight aisles away from Party Mix?
name: Elayne Boosler

quote: If you are ever at a loss to support a flagging conversation, introduce the subject of eating.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: Our biggest fear is that 'Food, Inc.' will move heavy-handed food-safety regulations forward.
name: Joel Salatin

quote: Attitudes toward food have completely changed.
name: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: Miss Child is never bashful with butter.
name: Phil Donahue

quote: Most vegetarians look so much like the food they eat that they can be classified as cannibals.
name: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: As a diabetic, I'm a walking picnic. I have to eat measured amounts of food at certain times.
name: Elaine Stritch

quote: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life.
name: Monica Bellucci

quote: Peruvian food is so simple yet amazingly flavored with their traditional spices.
name: L'Wren Scott

quote: Eating without conversation is only stoking.
name: Marcelene Cox

quote: The worst vice of the solitary is the worship of his food.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: I eat a variety of foods like vegetables, fruit and beef for protein and iron.
name: Sasha Cohen

quote: I'm not an amazing cook. But I can follow a recipe!
name: Rachel McAdams

quote: That's a big goal of mine, to try and grow as much of my own food as possible.
name: Daryl Hannah

quote: I like to eat and I love the diversity of foods.
name: David Soul

quote: The less food, the more time to talk, the more to talk about.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: Sitting down to a meal with an Indian family is different from sitting down to a meal with a British family.
name: Roland Joffe

quote: I fed them every day. So it was a papa that kept food on the table for them. I did that. I did my part.
name: Joe Jackson

quote: If I'm making a movie and get hungry, I call time-out and eat some crackers.
name: Carol Alt

quote: I'm not really a food connoisseur.
name: Aasif Mandvi

quote: I always say centered food equals centered behavior.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: Human beings do not eat nutrients, they eat food.
name: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: I love spaghetti and meatballs... I eat a lot.
name: Susan Lucci

quote: Confit is the ultimate comfort food, and trendy or not, it is dazzling stuff.
name: Sally Schneider

quote: I think Australian food is probably some of the best in the world.
name: Karrie Webb

quote: I always knew that food and wine were vital, with my mother being Italian and a good cook.
name: Robert Mondavi

quote: Food is your body's fuel. Without fuel, your body wants to shut down.
name: Ken Hill
